sparql: DEFINE get:refresh "0" DEFINE get:soft "replace" PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX bsbm: <http://www4.wiwiss.fu-berlin.de/bizer/bsbm/v01/vocabulary/> SELECT * WHERE { ?prdct rdf:type bsbm:Product . ?prdct rdfs:label ?prdctlbl . ?prdct bsbm:productFeature ?prdctft . ?prdct bsbm:productPropertyNumeric1 ?value1 }
